name: CurrentOrFormerOccupation
title: Current or Former Occupation
description: Description of the person's current or former occupation (Business ID: Entry 2200728)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Current or Former Occupation.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an description of the person's current or former occupation.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes GROUP codes for Current or Former Occupation.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Current or Former Occupation.)

contains.display: What kind of work were you doing [NHANES]
What kind of work were you doing the longest [NHANES]
What kind of business or industry did you work in for the longest period of time [NHANES]
Has season or migrant farm work been your or your family's main source of income at any point in past 2 years [PRAPARE]
